name: Average carbon footprint per salbutamol inhaler
title: Average carbon footprint per salbutamol inhaler
description: Mean average carbon impact (kg CO2e) per salbutamol inhaler prescribed
numerator_bnf_codes_query: SELECT DISTINCT bnf_code FROM {hscic}.presentation WHERE bnf_code IN ('0301011R0AAAPAP','0301011R0AABUBU','0301011R0AAAQAQ','0301011R0BEAHAQ','0301011R0BEAIAP','0301011R0BIAFAP','0301011R0BIAHAP','0301011R0BIAGBU','0301011R0BMAAAP','0301011R0BMABBU','0301011R0BWAABZ','0301011R0BWABAQ','0301011R0BXAACB','0301011R0BXAACB')
